name: Spellbroken Dream Festival
summary: A full-fledged scene game, in a style reminiscent of Spell Card Collection, Shoot the Bullet, Impossible Spell Card, etc. There are a total of 9 stages and 73 scenes. In addition to creative, unique spell card designs, there are also 4 different playable characters, a myriad of achievements, scoring challenges, and more things to do and goals to aim for.

videos.name: Trailer
videos.title: Afterparty Update for Touhou Danmuki ~ Spellbroken Dream Festival is Available Now!
